name: Bubble Defense
description:
Bubble Defense Known issues with Firefox where the bubbles don't appear. Please use Chrome :)

Protect the sea from the endless bubble menace!

- After setup, you will have 60 seconds to pop as many bubbles as possible

- Drag and drop sea-creature 'towers'  onto pegs

- Popping bubbles earns cash to purchase more towers

Created for the One Minute Game Jam #7 

Created by:

- Brad Larson UI/UX Game Design / Programming
- Matt Taylor Programming  Engine / Game

Thanks to the following for assets used in the game:

- SFX ZapSplat.com

- SFX Pixabay

- Graphics https://www.freepik.com
